response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item carries immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it's worth more than just its monetary value. We are offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is an exceptional chance to acquire something truly special at a premium rate. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
